effect.en: Put 2 Water Energy attached to this Pokémon into your hand.
effect.fr: Ajoutez à votre main 2 Énergies Water attachées à ce Pokémon.
effect.es: Pon 2 Energías Water unidas a este Pokémon en tu mano.
effect.it: Prendi due Energie Water assegnate a questo Pokémon e aggiungile alle carte che hai in mano.
effect.pt: Coloque 2 Energias Water ligadas a este Pokémon na sua mão.
effect.de: Nimm 2 an dieses Pokémon angelegte Water-Energien auf deine Hand.

description.en: Said to be the embodiment of north winds, it can instantly purify filthy, murky water.
